column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////It was very easy to make reservations
column2: to my relief. I made my reservation for 3 a couple days in advance and the time slots were wide open. I'm not sure we needed reservations
column3: as the space is very large (there are multiple seating areas) and there was plenty of seating when we got there a little after 10 am on Sunday. Even when we left
column4: there was still plenty of seating open
column5: though it was starting to fill up a little bit.
